definition: to explode or burst/to quick fry or quick boil
Massive Ordinance Air Blast (MOAB), a powerful American bomb
pinyin: da4 xing2 kong1 bao4 zha4 dan4
jian3 yi4 zha4 dan4 zhuang1 zhi4

sentences.english: The explosion was caused by a burst gas pipe .
sentences.chinese: 這次爆炸是由一個爆裂的煤氣管引起的。

sentences.english: Which, briefly, is like an explosion in a spear factory.
sentences.chinese: 簡單地說，就像兵工廠發生了爆炸。

sentences.english: But it has exploded in popularity, as this stage is the most vulnerable for the mayfly .
sentences.chinese: 但爆炸的人氣，作爲現階段最脆弱的蜉蝣。

sentences.english: GRBs come from some of the most energetic explosions known in the Universe.
sentences.chinese: GRBs來自宇宙中某些最高能量的爆炸。

sentences.english: Explosion hazardous area 2 usually adopts safety-increased explosion-proof fluorescent lamp.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸危險2區內一般使用增安型防爆熒光燈照明。

sentences.english: A shower of plasma followed by a shower of glass from exploding light bulbs.
sentences.chinese: 電燈泡爆炸後，與玻璃碎渣一同四濺的是等離子體。

sentences.english: It's also meant to withstand an explosion from inside.
sentences.chinese: 也意味着從裏向外阻止爆炸。

sentences.english: Menon however refrained from blaming Pakistan for the blasts.
sentences.chinese: 梅農對爆炸的指責有所控制，沒有直接指向巴基斯坦。

sentences.english: The puzzle of the cosmic age is a long-standing key problem in big bang cosmology.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙年齡是大爆炸宇宙學中的一個關鍵性的問題。

sentences.english: They returned in turn to bury the luxuries burnt in the burst.
sentences.chinese: 他們順次返返來埋躲在爆炸中銷燬的豪侈品。

sentences.english: In this paper, with the Cosmological model of big, it is explained that the Universe can not be heat still.
sentences.chinese: 本文利用宇宙大爆炸模型來說明宇宙不會“熱寂”。

sentences.english: An explosion was also reported at a military base in the Tajura region east of Tripoli.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸還報告了在的黎波里以東塔朱拉地區的軍事基地。

sentences.english: Explosive expanded sphere is an advanced technology for forming thin-wall spherical shell.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸脹球技術是一種成形薄壁球殼的先進技術。

sentences.english: When parents and children are temperamental opposites, the results can be explosive.
sentences.chinese: 當家長與孩子們脾氣相反時，其結果可能是爆炸性的。

sentences.english: Looks that last are a hallmark of Bang & Olufsen.
sentences.chinese: 看起來，最後是一個標誌性的爆炸和Olufsen。

definition: to cause to burn/to ignite/to detonate/a fuse
to explode/spontaneous detonation/self-detonation/suicide bombing/to disclose private matters about oneself
to explode or burst/to quick fry or quick boil
to break out/to erupt/to explode/to burst out
